text:
Today we are learning English with the unequaled 
Lana del Rey and some of her most successful

songs! So whether or not you are a fan of her 
music, if you watch this lesson until the end

you will learn how metaphors help you to build 
your fluency. And my favorite part of this lesson

is that you will be able to put your listening 
to the test with different activities! So we'll

jump into all that momentarily, but before we 
do this is the only place on youtube where you

will understand fast speaking natives, without 
getting lost, without missing the jokes and even

without subtitles. Just like Ana Vitoria who says 
that thanks to our lessons she can understand 90

percent of movies without subtitles. So are you 
ready to take your English to the next level? Then

join us! Hit the subscribe button and the bell 
down below so that you don't miss a single lesson.

So as an English learner you've probably 
already heard how songs can be a fun way

to improve your English. So if you 
like to listen to music in English

but you're not so sure how to study with, them 
then I highly recommend you check out this lesson

in which we teach you practical exercises 
to use songs to speak more confidently!

By the way, do you get frustrated 
when natives speak fast

and you can't understand? Do you want to 
be able to comprehend your favorite songs,

movies and series? Well to be able to 
do this you need to master three things:

vocabulary, pronunciation and cultural context. 
We will help you to do all this in our three part

master class and you'll have a ton of fun 
along the way! The best part is it's free!

So what are you waiting for? Sign up clicking 
up here or down the description box below.

Alright! So now I have a quiz for you where you 
will test your English listening with Lana del

Rey! And you know another great thing about 
learning with songs is that they often offer

rich cultural references. Lana's songs 
are absolutely full of American culture

and knowing about the culture is crucial if you 
want to understand songs, laugh with the jokes

in your favorite series or relate to native 
speakers. That is why over on our instagram

you can get a bonus lesson where you will 
learn all about American culture with

Lana! So be sure to check that 
out after you finish the quiz.

So if you speak English with the rhythm of your 
native language, it can make you sound a little

bit unnatural. Songs tend to exaggerate the 
rhythm of the language so they can be a great

tool to help you to practice speaking English with 
the correct rhythm and flow while stressing words

correctly. Of course because of the melody in 
some songs there might be a slight change in the

pronunciation. This is however the exception so it 
should not scare you away from learning with song.
